verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] be in Michigan next weekend for a campaign rally in Washington , Mich. , his campaign announced Tuesday .
[ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: in Michigan] [ARGM-TMP: next weekend] [ARGM-PRP: for a campaign rally in Washington , Mich.] , his campaign announced Tuesday .
President Donald Trump will be in Michigan next weekend for a campaign rally in Washington , Mich. , [ARG0: his campaign] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] .
